alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Murray; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 1:49AM CDT until April 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... West central Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 148 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Paoli to 3 miles south of Maysville to near Antioch to near Foster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Accumulating small hail is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Wynnewood, Stratford, Maysville, Roff, Elmore City, Paoli, Foster, Vanoss, Antioch and Whitebead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulating small hail may make travel difficult.
